item.title: BOJ_14391 종이 조각
item.description:
문제
Code n, m = map(int, input().split()) paper = [list(map(int, input())) for _ in range(n)] answer = -1 for case in range(1<<(n*m)): sum = 0 for i in range(n): num = 0 for j in range(m): idx = i * m + j if (case & (1<<idx)) == 0: num = num * 10 + paper[i][j] else: sum += num num = 0 sum += num for i in range(m): num = 0 for j in range(n): idx = j * m + i if (case & (1<<idx)) !
